attributes.action: Allow people who have worked and paid NI contributions to get jobseekers allowance even if they have had to pay the lower rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the rule which states that only NI contributions paid in the last 2 years are taken into consideration.  Instead, base the claim on the amount paid in total, thus allowing people who have had to work part time for a period to be eligible if made redundant.
